        isDeletion - This parameter is used to indicate whether it is deletion of habit to firebase

      • onItemClick

        public void onItemClick(int position)
        Description copied from interface: OnItemClickListener
        This method is an "abstract" method used to set onClickListener on each holder by parsing position from the adapter. This method will be override later on.
